artefact.overview: How to pay your court fine online or by telephone using a credit or debit card
artefact.more_information:
Please note the following:

- your payment must be received on (or before) the date ordered - if enforcement action has started, the court may reject your payment
- you can't pay [fixed penalty or parking fines](/parking-tickets/paying-a-ticket "Paying a parking ticket") using this service



##Pay your court fine by telephone using a credit or debit card

$C
0300 790 9901 (in England)  
0300 790 9980 (in Wales)  

You must have your 'Notice of Fine' with you.
$C
artefact.introduction: You can pay your court fine online if you use a credit card or debit card. You must have your 'Notice of Fine' with you.
expectations: Available in England and Wales only

details.description: Attending courts, paying fines, appealing a sentence and tribunals
